name: Chaos Mage
blurb: Unpredictable magicians who channel the icons themselves.
writeup: Who is in control, chaos or the magician? . . . Someone is in control, right?
backgrounds: blossoming witch, jester, fireworks exhibitionist, no-longer-frustrated librarian, stirge wrangler, living spell, living dungeon denizen, wandering musician, and hero from another world.
